subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer shot a five-under-par 67 and was tied for the lead after the second round of the Administaff Small Business Classic in the Woodlands, Tex. Langer, Lonnie Nielsen and Brad Bryant were all one shot better than Denis Watson.
snippet: Bernhard Langer shot a five-under-par 67 and was tied for the lead after the second round of the Administaff Small Business Classic in the Woodlands, Tex. Langer, Lonnie Nielsen and Brad Bryant were all one shot better than Denis Watson.
